summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2920, for the improvement of Massachusetts Street, from Frink Boulevard to Lake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, by the construction of wooden curbs and gutters and temporary wood walks, under Ordinance No. 35257 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
